import './Advantages.css' import { Col, Container, Row } from "react-bootstrap"; function Advantages(){ const ArraysOfAdvantage = [{ id: 1, title: "Гарантия", text: "Гарантия полета шаров от 7 до 30 дней" }, { id: 2, title: "", text: "" }, { id: 3, title: "", text: "" }, { id: 4, title: "", text: "" }]; const ArraysOfAdvantageOnMap = ArraysOfAdvantage.map((ArrayOfAdvantage) =>

{ArrayOfAdvantage.title}

{ArrayOfAdvantage.text}

) return(

Преимущества

 ) } export default Advantages
